Use BASH to send texts with Twilio

22 Dec 2018 #twilio #bash

This is a short note on how to send SMS messages using BASH and curl in macOS and Linux. Windows users can use GIT BASH.

Read more...

Acme Packet SBC “load-limit” Command Option

19 Nov 2012 #acme packet #sbc #sip

The Acme Packet SBC has an optional parameter that may be added under sip-config that allows the SBC to gracefully handle traffic in the event the SBC’s main processor reaches a certain threshold.

Read more...

Acme Packet SBC “packet-trace” Command (capturing SIP signaling)

19 Jun 2012 #acme packet #sbc #sip

The packet-trace ACLI command allows the Acme Packet SBC (Session Director) to capture SIP signaling communication between two endpoints and send the capture to external server such as Wireshark.The SBC uses the network interfaces (ie. media interfaces) to send the capture.

Read more...

Acme Packet SBC Register Grace Timer

24 Jan 2012 #acme packet #sbc #sip

The Acme Packet SBC contains an optional parameter that may be added to the configuration which helps avoid a SIP avalanche from occurring.

Read more...

Acme Packet SBC Media Aggregation

09 Nov 2011 #acme packet #sbc #sip

The Acme Packet 3800 and 4500 series Session Border Controllers come with an NIU (Network Interface Unit) that includes four Gigabit ports. In rare cases one may need to support Media Aggregation where two of the Gigabit interfaces need to be look like they are “bonded” to accommodate a large number of calls (with media anchored).

Read more...
